/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern apartment buildings, their facades painted in vibrant hues of red and orange, reflecting the city's lively atmosphere. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and urban infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the apartment buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
